text: Nimen ying yi zui hao de fangshi [yong liangyan quan tamen gui xin'an la] yu you jing ren [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] bianlun [zhu], tamen zhong de bu yi zhe chuwai. Nimen ying [dui tamen] shuo:“Women xinyang jiang shi women de jingdian [“gulanjing”], ye xinyang jiang shi nimen de jingdian, women suo chongbai de zhu he nimen suo chongbai de zhu shi tong yige zhu [an la], women yi guishun ta.”
